thread.title: Russia's Lavrov says to discuss how to save Iran nuclear deal with Zarif - Ifax

title: Russia's Lavrov says to discuss how to save Iran nuclear deal with Zarif - Ifax
text:
May 14, 2018 / 7:45 AM / Updated 21 minutes ago Russia's Lavrov says to discuss how to save Iran nuclear deal with Zarif - Ifax Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
MOSCOW (Reuters) - Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov said he would discuss how to try to save the Iran nuclear deal with Iranian Foreign Minister Mohammad Javad Zarif in Moscow later on Monday, the Interfax news agency reported. Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov invites his Iranian counterpart Mohammad Javad Zarif to have a seat during their meeting in Moscow, Russia May 14, 2018. REUTERS/Maxim Shemetov
Lavrov was cited as saying that U.S. President Donald Trump’s announcement last week that Washington would withdraw from the deal had created a “crisis situation,” the news agency reported. Reporting by Andrey Ostroukh; Editing by Andrew Osborn
